column4: i have installed tcl / tk 8.5 from source, but when i try to install amsn from source it cannot find the tcl language, suggestions please ?
configure: error: Unable to find Tcl directory or Tcl
did not get eny error on ./configure, make & make install, need som expert to look at it ;)
any*
whats the problem ?
cannot build amsn, it conplain about not finding tcl / tk
why are you not using the one out of the ubuntu repo's
well you've totally messed up your ubuntu dependency and package manager tree
hm, i will google, find a way around this
there are plenty of ways
but you've pretty much messed up your ubuntu install
;) just installed ubuntu so it's not a big thing but thx for your comment
why are you not using amsn from the repos
because the fonts look awful, not antialiasing
looks like linux did 1997
14px size of the fonts, not that nice
just change the fonts ?
it's about the tcl
tcl 8.5 will do it, ubuntu provide 8.4
fair enough, you seem reasonable confident in what your doing
thx mate,
